example.text: BIDEN WON'T DELIVER SAFETY AND SECURITY The Biden Administration has announced they will deploy Federal Air Marshals to our southern border in an attempt to control its self-made crisis. This means 99 percent of commercial flights will be stripped of federal protection during the busiest time of year.

Senate Republicans are united behind [[user]] and [[user]]. In a divided government, Biden must come to the table. Republicans passed a good bill to raise the debt ceiling and prevent default. Now it's in Biden's hands. [[user]]: Show us your cards and negotiate. [[url]]

WEEKLY WRAP UP One of Congress' most important jobs is to fund our military. While no bill is perfect, this year's NDAA ensures our servicemen and women are equipped with the resources necessary to deliver peace through strength.

Joe Biden is single-handedly responsible for the worst border catastrophe in American history. He has abandoned our brave border patrol officers, empowered drug cartels and traffickers, and exposed our country to a devastating fentanyl crisis. Repealing #Title42 is unforgivable.
